title: calc_water_year doesn't work with NA values
body:
This throws an error:
```r
# date vector w/ NAs
mydates <- seq(as.POSIXct('2010-01-01'), as.POSIXct('2011-01-01'), by='day')
mydates <- c(as.Date(NA), mydates, as.Date(NA))

calc_water_year(mydates)

Error in water.year[which.past.oct] <- cal.year[which.past.oct] + 1 :
  NAs are not allowed in subscripted assignments
```
